page.title: 18Machinery in Homes in Clun
page.content: We compiled a list of household gadgets and machinery found in over half the homes of children in our class: record player,spin dryer, gas fire, vacuum cleaner, T.V (coloured), deep freeze, radio-cassette, fridge, lawn mower, food mixer, toaster, car, telephone, kettle, electric drill, iron, hair dryer, cooker, washing machine(automatic), clock radio, shaver, immersion heater, torch, table lamp, shower, slow cooker,coffee maker, sewing machine, wall unit display light and electric teasmade. The following are found in over a quarter of homes: heated hair rollers, electric carving knife, T.V games, tumble dryer, strimmer and calculator.
